summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Project Reports restructuring. All features working correctly - menu renamed from 'Test Reports' to 'Project Reports', 4 sub-categories displayed, 12 equipment types with updated icons, Save Report button working with redirect, and back navigation fixed.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed Cancel button in CreateTestReport.js - was navigating to old URL /projects/test-reports/${equipmentId}, now correctly navigates to /projects/project-reports/equipment/${equipmentId}
seed_data_creation: Created Transformer test report (TR/2026/0004) via UI automation for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Project Reports module fully restructured and working. All navigation paths verified. Cancel button URL fixed.
